author: Rich Stanton
description: Aims to reinvent how players tackle the gigantic bosses.
title: The creator of DayZ has just released DLC that basically turns survival game Icarus into a firstperson monster-hunting game

author: Jody Macgregor
description: You've got your vacation plans and I've got mine.
title: Live out your fantasy of sailing, surfing, and… stabbing shark monsters in Voyagers of Nera

author: Christopher Livingston
description: Car 1: Greenhouse. Car 2: Aquarium. Car 3: Underground cavern? What the heck is going on in this train?
title: In co-op survival game Railborn, build the weirdest mobile train base anyone's ever seen and chug it around on an alien planet

author: Kara Phillips
description: The bugs are getting an upgrade, but so are we.
title: Obsidian wants to add a 'new layer of strategy' to combat in Grounded 2, resulting in tougher bugs, class-like archetypes, and the ability to dash

author: Fraser Brown
description: Park life.
title: Grounded 2's starter area is the size of the entire first game, and you can get around by riding ants and spiders—this might end up being my new favourite survival game

author: Shaun Prescott
description: The new trailer for The Last Caretaker trades in haunted radiophonic vibes.
title: The Last Caretaker is an oceanic first-person survival shooter that tasks you with rebuilding humanity in a drowning world

author: Christopher Livingston
description: It's a pretty packed schedule.
title: A week in tactical RPG Demonschool includes karaoke, romance, dog adoption, lost sandwiches, cursed dolls, and lots of monster battles

author: Shaun Prescott
description: No thin crusts here.
title: Pizza Bandit is a third-person shooter about an ex-merc who wants to run a pizza joint, but aliens have different plans

author: Alice Bell
description: Love in the time of cauliflower.
title: Leaving Fallen London: How Failbetter Games spent several years growing hope and ‘discovering the art of the possible’ in their new eldritch farming sim

author: Kara Phillips
description: Farming sims with a darker edge are the in thing it seems—wishlist Mandrake on Steam
title: Failbetter Games’ next venture swaps Fallen London for an alluring narrative farming simulator—the PC Gaming Show 2025 gives us our first look at its enchanting world

author: Jody Macgregor
description: Oh, you made a co-op version of Elden Ring? Shiro Games says: "Hold my beer."
title: Farever is the multiplayer Zelda-like you've been waiting for—check out its shiny trailer aired at the PC Gaming Show 2025

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: Even zombies like dinner and a show.
title: Co-op zombie shooter No More Room in Hell 2 is bringing back the fan-favorite Broadway map to kick off its summer of updates

author: Andy Chalk
description: Botsu, the new game from Peculiar Pixels and Devolver Digital, is set to arrive later this year, but you can get a taste right now.
title: Devolver's new multiplayer ragdoll robot rumble Botsu unleashes a free demo on Steam

author: Joe Donnelly
description: No, I’m Not a Human might even be one of the weirdest horror games in the history of the genre…
title: “An overlooked visitor will kill you”: No, I’m Not a Human is one of the weirdest horror games to have ever graced the PC Gaming Show—play its super unsettling demo

author: Joshua Wolens
description: Always a good idea... right?
title: Excellent subnautical society sim Barotrauma just announced its first expansion, and it looks like we'll be able to build Rapture

author: Mollie Taylor
description: The PC Gaming Show showed off the sequel to Digital Sun's 2018 action RPG-slash-merchant sim.
title: Moonlighter 2's unlikely duo of cosy shopkeeping and intense dodge-rolling action looks ridiculously charming, and I'm already anticipating its upcoming demo

author: Joe Donnelly
description: The pieces are fast falling into place for this action role-player inspired by Pathfinder’s second edition.
title: Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults drops a quintessential ARPG trailer at the PC Gaming Show 2025—wishlist it now on Steam

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: Surely that'll smooth over the auto-amputations.
title: Self-cloning sci-fi survival game The Alters might look like a harrowing psychological experience, but at least you and your alt-universe selves can have a dance party

author: Elie Gould
description: "Hotshot for hire."
title: The Outer Worlds 2 will have a Fallout: New Vegas-style radio system with tons of music and reactivity: 'They're gonna be cheering you on as a hero'

author: Rick Lane
description: Generation Exile's demo is available until June 16.
title: Generation Exile, a turn-based city builder about managing a generation ship, releases a demo tomorrow—but it already has the best narrative choice of any game this year

author: Wes Fenlon
description: Modulus also has an extra hook: designing your own factory parts.
title: Modulus looks like a must-play factory game for anyone who loves a thousand little parts on a hundred conveyor belts moving in perfect rhythm

author: Andy Chalk
description: Dawn Apart dropped a trailer at the PC Gaming Show 2025—and there's a demo you can try on Steam.
title: Lead a factory colony on an alien world, or rise up against your corporate overlords, in Dawn Apart, a 'space colony and factory sim' coming to Steam later this year

author: Elie Gould
description: "We wanted every game to take place in a different colony."
title: The Outer Wilds 2 has revealed its two most important factions: Angry authoritarian jocks and holier than thou science-bros who just want to solve a maths problem

author: Rick Lane
description: Expect it to be well optimised.
title: Kaizen: A Factory Story, the Japanese production line sim from the creators of SpaceChem, gets a demo later this month and a full release in July

author: Joshua Wolens
description: And probably just as dangerous for your free time as that sounds.
title: SkyRig is systems-builder for Factorio sickos set in the skies of a bulging gas giant

author: Rick Lane
description: The Frontier expands on June 11.
title: EVE Frontier, CCP's survival MMO about rebuilding civilization among the ruins of a spacefaring empire, is getting a big update and moving into public alpha

author: Justin Wagner
description: Ever wonder if you'd get mutinied?
title: Train-hopping PvP sandbox Enginefall has a truly ambitious premise and I can't wait to backstab all my friends in it

author: Jacob Ridley
description: Microsoft and Asus team up to put Windows on an AMD-powered handheld, and apparently that makes it an Xbox.
title: 'This is an Xbox' says Microsoft of its new handheld, but let's be honest, it's a PC

author: Kara Phillips
description: Another adventure in the Prince of Persia series awaits in early access.
title: Action platformer The Rogue Prince of Persia re-announces itself at the PC Gaming Show 2025 with a new breakneck baddie-slashing, boss-battling trailer

author: Justin Wagner
description: A gruesome caboose awaits you in Spooky Express's monster-staffed theme park.
title: A-freight of the dark? I'm already spellbound by Spooky Express, an adorable puzzle game about trains and also vampires

author: Harvey Randall
description: Viva la resist-dance at the PC Gaming Show 2025
title: All Systems Dance, a game about overthrowing a smarmy tech billionaire with the power of dance, is grooving its way to early access this August

author: Joe Donnelly
description: The PC Gaming Show went behind the scenes  with 10 Chambers for an exclusive chat at its Stockholm HQ
title: ‘We could go from a shooter to a platformer to a horror theme’: How stepping away from Payday 2’s real-world framing has helped Den of Wolves turn high-stakes heisting on its head

author: Andrea Shearon
description: Well, it's that and romance. I'll play anything with a little flirting.
title: Necesse looks like top-down Terraria, and that's the magic combination to get my attention for its 1.0 release date reveal

author: Rick Lane
description: Snuggle up with Moomintroll: Winter's Warmth next year.
title: Hyper Games is back with another cozy Moomin adventure, and this time Moomintroll is the main character

author: Justin Wagner
description: Catch rhythm fever and take down giant bosses to the music.
title: Drum up an army in the demo for Ratatan, a roguelike rhythm game with huge Patapon vibes heading to Early Access

author: Justin Wagner
description: The co-op looter shooter comes bearing a kaleidoscopic palette.
title: Mad Max one second, Cyberpunk the next—Terminull Brigade is looking like every roguelike everywhere, all at once

author: Joe Donnelly
description: The latest look at Fresh Tracks brought along a familiar face to the PC Gaming Show 2025
title: Fresh Tracks reveals a release date for its rhythmic demon slaying with breakneck heavy metal and—wait, is that Peter Stormare?

author: Christopher Livingston
description: The sequel to Obsidian's RPG launches this October.
title: The Outer Worlds 2 'has more perks than Fallout: New Vegas,' says Obsidian—including one that turns you into a heart-collecting serial killer

author: Ted Litchfield
description: I've been waiting for Neverwinter Nights 2: Enhanced Edition for a long, long time.
title: The remaster of classic D&D RPG Neverwinter Nights 2 is finally real, and releasing next month

author: Morgan Park
description: The Pumpkin Jack developer is back in a new genre.
title: Far Far West is music to my ears: a 4-player co-op FPS with ghost bandits and elemental spell combos

author: Charlotte Krol
description: Despite a troubled industry, the indie studio is 'owning our destiny' with a unique idea built from emotive stories and painterly graphics in its space clean-up RPG
title: 'It’s a bit of an existential priority for us to stand out': ex-Ubisoft and Bethesda devs on new studio Soft Rains, longevity, and debut sci-fi game Ambrosia Sky

author: Morgan Park
description: Soft Rains debuted its first game at the PC Gaming Show 2025.
title: Ambrosia Sky is a narrative power-washing game with the heart of an immersive sim—try the Steam demo now

author: Andy Chalk
description: The next game from Pekoe developer Kitten Cup Studio revealed a new trailer at the PC Gaming Show.
title: Capy Castaway is a whimsical exploration adventure inspired by memories of childhood about a capybara and a crow trying to find their way home

author: Justin Wagner
description: A guy's head explodes into gore in the first 20 seconds of the trailer.
title: Invincible VS is the second amazing-looking superhero tag fighter to crop up in the last three days

author: Tyler Colp
description: Keeper will be out in October.
title: Tired of words? Double Fine's next game is a 'story told without words' that stars a walking lighthouse and its pet bird

author: Andrea Shearon
description: Today's trailer offers a quick peek at Outbound's life inside and outside of the van.
title: Laid-back camper sim Outbound cozies up with more than just van-life, it's got the full crafting and exploration game package

author: Robin Valentine
description: Whiskerwood may be full of cute little fuzzy rodents, but it takes its simulation seriously.
title: Whiskerwood, a city builder about mice colonising the seas, contains a lot more revolution against oppressive imperial regimes than I expected

author: Joshua Wolens
description: This is what I want my game designers thinking about and no, I am not joking.
title: The Outer Worlds 2 has a 'bad knees' perk that makes your old-man legs pop and alert enemies when you stand, and another that Obsidian fully admits makes the game 'pretty unplayable'

author: Morgan Park
description: We're getting back-to-back Blops.
title: What? Call of Duty is skipping over Modern Warfare 4 and releasing Black Ops 7 this year instead

author: Wes Fenlon
description: The scrounging, upcycling shop sim full of colorful customers just left early access.
title: Cozy shop sim Trash Goblin invites you to build your own colorful doodads, but I'm convinced its real star is the smolderingly sexy Mushromeo

author: Rich Stanton
description: Just point me at it.
title: Ninja Gaiden 4 looks sick, is out in October, and has the exact storytelling I demand from a ninja game: 'You're a wanted criminal now'

author: Joshua Wolens
description: And just like that, I'm 15 again.
title: Persona 4 Revival is officially real, giving us our first look at 4K Charlie Tunoku in a remake with a very angry original voice cast

author: Christopher Livingston
description: Grounded 2 comes to game preview in July.
title: Obsidian announces a sequel to its backyard co-op survival game Grounded—and surprisingly, it'll be in early access next month

author: Andy Chalk
description: The Order of Giants was revealed during today's Xbox Showcase.
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle heads for the catacombs of Rome in its first DLC, coming in September

author: Tyler Wilde
description: The sci-fi shooter sequel is coming this winter.
title: If High on Life 2's skateboard shooting is as fun as they make it look in the trailer, I can tolerate wisecracking guns

author: Fraser Brown
description: The latest Plague Tale game is missing my favourite bit.
title: Resonance: A Plague Tale Legacy has a suspicious dearth of killer rats

author: Rich Stanton
description: Juicy.
title: Super Meat Boy 3D looks a bit like plasticine but I'm not hating it

author: Elie Gould
description: Burn them, and then burn them some more.
title: Bloober Team's upcoming horror game Cronos: The New Dawn just got even harder to survive as the 'body-horror monstrosities' can work together

author: Joshua Wolens
description: How gruff can a protagonist get? Scientists aim to find out.
title: 'What if Blade was a witcher?' is the scary question asked as Blood of Dawnwalker from former CDPR devs announces 2026 release

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: Beast of Reincarnation was revealed at the Xbox Games Showcase today.
title: Game Freak reminds us that it's more than Pokémon with Beast of Reincarnation, a 'one-person, one-dog action RPG' about fighting robots and corrupted beasts in post-apocalyptic Japan

author: Jeremy Laird
description: The Z2 family now includes fully four different generations of AMD APU. Seriously?
title: AMD's baffling 'new' Ryzen Z2 APUs for handheld gaming PCs include a premium 'AI' model with an NPU and seemingly the ancient chip from Valve's Steam Deck

author: Tyler Wilde
description: Join us for another round of new trailers and big announcements as we cover this year's Xbox Games Showcase.
title: Xbox Games Showcase 2025 live: All the announcements in real-time

author: Rick Lane
description: Ascended's paid DLC also gets a new island, featuring the game's first-ever duo miniboss.
title: Ark: Survival Ascended celebrates 10 years of dino-dodging with a visual upgrade and letting you run around in your birthday suit

author: Rick Lane
description: There's also a new trailer that spends too long talking about toilets.
title: Baby Steps, Bennett Foddy's slapstick walking simulator about a slob climbing a mountain, stumbles onto Steam in September

author: Rick Lane
description: Facepunch's latest update also gives interiors a lighting pass and adds bee bombs for catapults.
title: Rust's recently added rainforest is so dense the developers changed how resources spawn because players couldn't find them: 'The jungle was a bit too good at being a jungle'

author: Rick Lane
description: The Wheel of Time turns, and adaptations come and go.
title: Amazon may have cancelled the Wheel of Time show, but the open world RPG ploughs ahead with talent from games like Dark Age of Camelot and Lord of the Rings Online

author: Jody Macgregor
description: Play the demo for Your Holy & Virtuous Heretic now.
title: I defeated a bird by talking to it about the Bible in this lo-fi first-person RPG where you're a 19th century daemon summoner

author: Jody Macgregor
description: Probably tomato juice. You serve tomato juice here?
title: Innkeep lets you play an extremely suspect fantasy innkeeper, though I'm sure the bloodstains on your apron can be easily explained

author: Kerry Brunskill
description: Help with solving Sunday's puzzle.
title: Today's Wordle answer for Sunday, June 8

author: Jody Macgregor
description: Apothecary of City X is a mortar-and-pestle mashup.
title: Here's an alchemy shop-sim that is also a mech-builder deckbuilder
